TopicTitle: Notifications become too frequent - can we get an option to disable them selectively or completely?

Articles.Content:
I have searched this forum and not found a topic about this, I apologize if I missed the relevant posting (I can't imagine that I am the only player who noticed that).

Question: What can be done about the frequent notifications (e.g. when the solar panels of your craft stop producing electricity because you enter the dark side of the planet)?

These notifications should be (imo) only part of the "new player experience" or be configurable. I am pretty sure that after a while of playing we know that solar panels do not produce EC when in the dark. Having a window pop up every time (and in such large size) is very distracting and very annoying.

Suggestion: Some kind of option to disable certain or all notifications for more experienced players.

Thanks!
